testcase.name: User_Successfully_Logs_Into_The_Demo_Application
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin
scenario: User successfully logs into the demo application e given I am on the Demo Login Page ... passed in 5.378s when I fill the account information for account StandardUser into the Username field and the password field ... passed in 1.234s when I click the Login Button ... passed in 0.2824s then I am redirected to demo main page ... passed in 0.02213s then I verify the App Logo exists ... passed in 0.08023s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Failed_Login
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin
scenario: Failed Login e given I am on the Demo Login Page ... passed in 5.23s when I fill the account information for account LockedOutUser into the Username field and the Password field ... passed in 1.206s when I click the Login Button ... passed in 0.2036s then I verify the Error Message contains the text "Epic sadface: Sorry, this user has been locked out." ... passed in 0.09452s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Extract_Data
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin
scenario: Extract data e given I am logged in ... passed in 6.434s when I am on the inventory page ... passed in 0.1018s then I extract content from the web page ... passed in 0.9224s then Save it to a text file ... passed in 0.003922s then I log out ... passed in 5.196s then I verify I am on the Login page again ... passed in 0.01727s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
